connectToGateway

public boolean connectToGateway()
Establish a connection the the gateway (bind). The connection will be kept open for the lifetime of the session. Concurrent connections will be possible from other smpp services. The status of the connection will be checked before sending a message, and an auto-bind will be made if possible.

Specified by:
connectToGateway in interface SmsSmpp

disconnectGateWay

public void disconnectGateWay()
Unbind from the gateway. If disconnected, no message sending will be possible. For unit testing purposes.

Specified by:
disconnectGateWay in interface SmsSmpp

processMessageRemotely

public void processMessageRemotely()
Call an external service to handle the processing of an outgoing message. This could be a simple php script or another Java service.

Specified by:
processMessageRemotely in interface SmsSmpp

sendBulkMessagesToGateway

public org.sakaiproject.sms.hibernate.model.SmsMessage[] sendBulkMessagesToGateway(org.sakaiproject.sms.hibernate.model.SmsMessage[] messages)
Send a list of Bulk messages to the gateway. This method is not implemented because it does not return a list of message id's. The optional parameters are causing an exception.

sendMessagesToGateway

public java.lang.String sendMessagesToGateway(java.util.Set<org.sakaiproject.sms.hibernate.model.SmsMessage> messages)
Send a list of messages one-by-one to the gateway. Abort if the gateway connection is down or when gateway returns an error and mark relevant messages as failed. Return message statuses (not reports) back to caller.

Specified by:
sendMessagesToGateway in interface SmsSmpp
Returns:

sendMessageToGateway

public org.sakaiproject.sms.hibernate.model.SmsMessage sendMessageToGateway(org.sakaiproject.sms.hibernate.model.SmsMessage message)
Send one message to the SMS gateway. Return result code to caller.

Specified by:
sendMessageToGateway in interface SmsSmpp
